channel.title: Need some pro help on 508 commands

item.title: Need some pro help on 508 commands
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

So my current command is:

if (cmd[0].equals("banplayer") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("Cubanguy")) { String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.getActionSender().logout(p2); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "The player " + p2.username + " has been banned. Congratiolations."); p2.appendToBanned(victim); Server.loadBannedUsers(); BufferedWriter bw = null; p.updateReq = true; p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } }

I’ve been fiddelling with it all day and I cant seem to make it so it’s player rights 1 or more who can use it. What do I alter? I’ve never done much with 508’s.

Read full topic
item.source: Need some pro help on 508 commands
